text: Mba ŋaara gumgi vhɨra, mbe won guma bakɨme zɨrga tuk, mbe tuituigia ana kaŋgi fhuvara. Ana maaŋ muuŋgip maaŋ rɨgar mben hɨgɨrga thi? Ana fharigi tuari furim, ana mben hɨrga thi? Ana maaŋ muuŋgip zɨv, won ŋaara gumgi ganɨrim, mbe ŋkuu thav ana rargɨp kɨrga, ana zɨv mbe ganɨri, mba ŋaara gumgi, mbe ndikndigɨri.
